channel.title: Utorrent
channel.description:
Ok ive been hosting my server for ages with uttorent been doing the same step over and over. Now for this once it says for other people error connecting to server! Am i doing the right steps?
First run no-ip Wait for it to load and tick all the boxes Then run my server Then open uttorent.
Thats how ive been hosting it for about a month now. And today it stopped working. Can anyone help?
Dont tell me to restart my computer because iv'e tried that. I cant portfoward because im not aloud because apparently it slows your internet connection down.

item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

im using 1.8.1 does that make a difference?

Read full topic

then ur server shud work ;D,
